biotools.summary: Sharing descriptive metadata is the first essential step towards the “Open Data” approach. With this in mind, the Maggot tool was specially designed to allow users to easily add descriptive metadata to datasets produced within a collective (research unit, platform, multi-partner project, etc.), thus promoting the sharing of metadata within this same collective and beyond.

bioschemas.name: Maggot
